title: second_chapter_start
body:
I am gonna get you out of danger!
I don't see how you can manage it
Just leave me here
Save yourself..
I will not leave you!
Not if my life depend on it
Come on
Damn Undead
[[stop]]

title: help_on_the_way
body:
Who are you?
Does that matter now?
Help me hold them off
I must get him to our hideout
To Mable
[[stop]]

title: we_are_coming
body:
Come in
Location acquired
We are 5 minutes from your location
Try to hold them off for the meanwhile
[[stop]]

title: who_are_you
body:
General Keevan: Mable acknowledge your help
Who are you?
Mace McKafry
If you ever arrive at Mable come to me
Where are you from anyway?
Not far from here, Kerod
Alright, see you
For now, accept this as payment for your help
[[stop]]
